name: The Shadow Spiral
description: A massive spiral structure composed entirely of dark matter, absorbing all light around it.
theories: Remnant of an ancient supermassive black hole

name: Quantum Nebula
description: A nebula that emits unpredictable quantum fluctuations, disrupting spacecraft electronics.

name: The Infinity Echo
description: A repeating radio signal that loops every 48 hours with no known origin.
theories: Message from an extinct alien civilization
Echo of the Big Bang still bouncing across spacetime
